description.bole.bole_handbook: Helps you know more about entities.
text.autoconfig.bole.title: Settings of Bole
text.autoconfig.bole.option.allowHotKeyT: So you don't have to hold a book in your hand in survival mode.
text.autoconfig.bole.option.invulnerable:
Tamed animals will never lose health
(unless damaged by DROWN, DRYOUT and ANVIL).
text.autoconfig.bole.option.forbidToSetN: You will not be allowed to modify other players' nether portal cooldown.
text.autoconfig.bole.option.broadcastWhe: Broadcast the spawn information of WanderingTrader to every player.
property_widget.bole.handbook_entity.des: Button1: highlights nearby entities for 8 seconds.
property_widget.bole.air.description: The entity will lose health when oxygen is depleted.
property_widget.bole.bounding_box.descri:
Bounding box or hit box of the entity.
"Red" and "Blue" means the width of it, and "Green" means the height of it (unit: meter).
property_widget.bole.nether_portal_coold: Cooldown time of crossing a nether portal.
Button1: set the cooldown to infinity or zero.
property_widget.bole.custom_name.descrip: Custom name of the entity given by a name tag.
Button1: set whether the custom name is always displayed.
Button1: set whether to keep the entity quiet.
property_widget.bole.invulnerable.descri:
Button1: set the entity invulnerable or not.
You can still damage it in creative mode.
property_widget.bole.health.description:
Each red bar represents up to 20 points.
A golden bar represents more than 20 points.
Max health is usually between 15 and 30.
property_widget.bole.leash: Whether the Entity Can Be Leashed
property_widget.bole.leash.description: Whether the entity can be leashed by a rope.
Button1: enable/disable the AI of the entity.
property_widget.bole.baby.description: The growth stage of the baby entity.
property_widget.bole.baby.description.bu: Button1: set whether the baby will never grow up.
property_widget.bole.attractive_items.de: When you hold these items, the entity will follow you.
property_widget.bole.breeding_items.desc: The food you can use to breed the entity.
property_widget.bole.beehive.description: Shows the distance between the bee and its bee nest or beehive.
Button1: highlight the bee nest or beehive for 6 seconds.
Button2: lets the bee to find a new bee nest or beehive.
property_widget.bole.eat_grass.descripti:
Force the sheep to eat grass under it.
Since you can force the sheep to eat wheat, of course you can also force it to eat grass (:P) ~
Button1: click to eat grass. You can't click it when there's no grass under the sheep.
property_widget.bole.sit_on_player_coold: Cooldown of Sitting on the Shoulder of the Player
After how long it can sit on the shoulder of the player.

Button1: set the cooldown to infinity or zero. 
Due to technical reasons, reloading the world will cause the cooldown to reset.
Running speed is usually between 4.74m/s and 14.23m/s.
Jump height is usually between 1.09m and 5.29m.
Click to open the interaction screen of the inventory.
property_widget.bole.villager_job_site.d: Shows the distance between the villager and the job site.
Button1: highlight the job site for 6 seconds.
property_widget.bole.villager_restock.de: Button1: force the villager to restock (need to pay overtime).
property_widget.bole.cat_variant.descrip: You can only change the variant in creative mode.
property_widget.bole.parrot_variant.desc: You can only change the variant in creative mode.
property_widget.bole.horse_color_variant: You can only change the variant in creative mode.
property_widget.bole.horse_marking_varia: You can only change the variant in creative mode.
property_widget.bole.panda_main_gene.des: You can only change the gene in creative mode.
property_widget.bole.panda_hidden_gene.d: You can only change the gene in creative mode.
property_widget.bole.axolotl_variant.des: You can only change the variant in creative mode.
property_widget.bole.wandering_trader_de: Despawn Delay of the Wandering Trader
The trader will leave (disappear) when the time is up.
Button1: give it a bucket of water to drink, and it will stay for two more minutes.
text.hint.bole.only_in_god_mode: Can only be used in creative mode.
text.hint.bole.highlight_not_enough_expe: You need at least two experience points to use this skill.
text.hint.bole.forbid_to_set_nether_port: The server prohibits setting nether portal cooldown of other players.
text.hint.bole.not_baby: It's meaningless to lock the growth stage of adult creatures...
text.hint.bole.no_beehive: This bee has no beehive or bee nest yet.
text.hint.bole.eating_grass: Wait two seconds. The sheep is eating grass!
text.hint.bole.far_from_grass: There is no grass under the sheep!
text.hint.bole.not_enough_items: You don't have enough items to purchase this service!
text.hint.bole.far_from_job_site: The villager is too far away from the job site!
text.hint.bole.no_job_site: The villager has no job site!
text.hint.bole.job_site_different_dimens: The job site is not in this dimension!
text.hint.bole.refuse_to_reset_job: The villager sternly rejected your rude request (maybe you should hold a sword to threaten it).
text.error.bole.client_server_mod_versio: Mod Bole: The mod version of the client does not match the mod version of the server!
text.warning.bole.enable_ai: Maybe just put its frontal lobe back in...
text.warning.bole.disable_ai:
You want to perform a frontal lobotomy to incapacitate it. But it will fight back. So you will spend:
Health x%s
Satiety x%s
text.warning.bole.open_merchant_inventor: If you are willing to pay %d %ss, the merchant will let you rummage through its inventory.
text.warning.bole.villager_reset_job:
Usually players tend to kill villagers with unsatisfactory trading lists. Thinking of this, the villager readily accepts your kindness.
Are you sure to reset?
text.bole.mod_not_installed: It means that you have not installed the mod `Bole` if you see this text. You may download this mod at:
text.bole.target_entity_too_far: The target entity is too far from you.
text.bole.wandering_trader_spawn_message: A wandering trader spawns around the player %s.
text.bole.server_ban_hotkey: The hotkey is banned on this server. Find a bole handbook item first.
